extendedInfo.description: Secret Diary with password is a simple password protected application that allows you to securely save all your thoughts with a password that is chosen by you when you first open the diary.Using this diary you can very easy put down all your thoughts or even future plans and follow them as the time passes. This app can be your secret life journal that will help you remember the pleasant times and will make you smile.Since always people  wanted to express their feelings not only to each other but to themselves. So the journal was invented, but we all know how unprotected it was. Nowadays  we like to call it DIARY. We all remember with joy how we were hiding in secret the diary in places where we thought nobody will ever find :). But what better place to hide then under your own secret password. This locked diary with password is able to stock all your thoughts using a secured key known only by you. Your thoughts are now safe and secure and you are the only one who can read them. Trust this protected diary and write down all your believes and thoughts starting today. Enjoy writing and don't worry about anything(you are the only one who knows the password).Every secret that you write is protected by the password that you initially choose. You can at any time change the password as long as you are the owner. Consider this application as your real secret diary protected by the password that only you know.With internet connection you will be able to save all the entries on a secured server with only one password. This allows you to synchronize all your devices and write from wherever you want.Enjoy your own secret diary with password and don't forget to leave your positive remarks and reviews.Thank you and enjoy!

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: It deleted all of my entries I have saved since new years im not starting over do UNINSTALL
reviews.author: Bre\'yanna Wilson

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: It suddenly stopped that i need to unstall it and install it again. When i installed it all my entries are gone!! :\'(  now better to remove it now.
reviews.author: ella reyes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it. Its really cool and it stops people from reading my secrets. Amazing app
reviews.author: GRACE PARKER

reviews.title: 1 dislike...
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had a problem with this app and I really like it but if you change you password and forget it, there isn\'t a way to get your password back... that should really be changed
reviews.author: haley becklinson

reviews.title: I luv this diary ;-)
reviews.comment: Pick this diary ova all that others it is tha coolest!
reviews.author: Ashley Stevenson

reviews.title: STUPID!
reviews.comment: It\'s so stupid. It won\'t even let me put in a password. If this is a diary with a password, why won\'t it let me have a password? WOW!

reviews.title: I think I\'m in love
